title: Apps
embedsDescription: Integrate any custom iframe as an application within the platform.
loomDescription: Record, insert and share videos from Loom directly in your Suuper projects
stripeDescription: Connect to multiple payment gateways around the world and sell your services as a subscription
treliDescription: Connect to multiple payment gateways in LATAM and sell your services as a subscription
headerDescription: Add new features from the app store
loomSettingsTitle: Set up Loom in your business
loomSettingsDescription: Integrate Loom into your Suuper portal by obtaining a Standard SDK configuration of your developer account
stripeSettingsTitle: Set up Stripe in your business
embedsSettingsTitle: Set up Embeds in your business
embedsSettingsDescription: Integrate any custom iframe as an application within the platform.
stripeSettingsDescription: Configure access to your Stripe account so users can pay in your project
treliSettingsTitle: Set up Treli in your business
treliSettingsDescription: Configure access to your Treli account so users can pay in your project
getRecommendations: Get more recommendations in the Suuper App Store
tooltipWebhookDescription: Set up the webhook in Treli to receive notifications about events like subscription creation.
step1: Go to Settings - API Keys and Webhooks
step3: Fill out the form (use the generated URL)
step4: Select the event 'Subscription created' in events to send
